title: foia_ao
abstract:
May 21, 2009
The Honorable James C. Duff, Director
Administrative Office of the United States Courts
One Columbus Circle, N.E.
Washington, DC 20544
Dear Mr. Duff:
This is a request under the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. 552. While the 
Administrative Office of the United States Courts is not directly subject to the 
requirements of the Freedom of Information Act, other exempt agencies uniformly 
subscribe to the “intent and spirit” of the FOIA and respond in a routine fashion to 
request
